refnamediv.refpurpose: List of FITS keys written by various devices to produced FITS files

refsect1.title: SYNOPSIS
refsect1.para:
RTS2 writes values, which were deemed usefull to record, to FITS file. As RTS2 can support various instruments, each with different values, the FITS key names cannot be specified with FITS template file.
Instead, various RTS2 devices can define keys which will be written to a RTS2 image.

refsect1.title: OBSERVATION SPACE AND TIME COORDINATES KEYS
refsect1.para: RTS2 writes various keys, which describe time and location where the image was taken.

listitem.para: Integer in computer time, represening number of seconds from 1. Jan 1970. Please be aware, that computer time ingores leap seconds. It should not be used for precise timing analysis.

refsect1.title: TARGET KEYS
refsect1.para: Following keys are ussually written to target. They represent various target parameters.

listitem.para: Integer value, representing number of loop main script takes. It is 0 at beginign, increasign every time script goes to the end of observation.

refsect1.title: CCD KEYS
refsect1.para: Various CCD characteristics are recorded. This manul describe only generic values, for camera specific one see manul pages for this camera driver.

listitem.para: Type of CCD, some string value more or less precisely representing it.
